name: GAMOP
description:
GAMOP - CHEMICAL INDUSTRY OPERATOR TRAINING

This is an virtual environment where people that wants to know or train operator skills in a chemical industry without getting in trouble in real situations, like opening a wrong valve and explode everything!

We are working on with a Brazilian chemical industry, but still in development.
